official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Parker Dykes deserves to be recognized for his years of commitment to football and his community and is extremely worthy of the award of National Junior College Coach of the Year.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that Parker Dykes deserves to be recognized for his years of commitment to football and his community and is extremely worthy of the award of National Junior College Coach of the Year.
